org.melior.util.object

Interface ObjectUtil


  • public interface ObjectUtil
    Utility functions that apply to all objects.
    Since:
    2.2
    Author:
    Melior

    • Method Summary

      • requireNonNull

        static <T> void requireNonNull(T obj,
                               String message)
                        throws ApplicationException
        Require object to not be null. If the object is null then an exception is raised with the message.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type
        Parameters:
        obj - The object
        message - The message
        Throws:
        ApplicationException - if the object is null

      • ensureNonNull

        static <T> List<T> ensureNonNull(List<T> list)
        Ensures that the returned list is never null. If the input list is null then a new list is created.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type
        Parameters:
        list - The input list
        Returns:
        The input list, or a new list if the input list is null

      • translate

        @SafeVarargs
static <T> T translate(T obj,
                                     T... options)
        Translate object. If no option matches the object then the following applies: if the last option is unary then it is returned as a default translation, otherwise null is returned.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type
        Parameters:
        obj - The object
        options - The available options
        Returns:
        The translation
